original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Vicāravagga
analyzed: vicāra vagga

original: 6. Vedagūpañha
analyzed: vedagūpañha

original: Rājā āha—
analyzed: rājā āha

original: “bhante nāgasena, vedagū upalabbhatī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena vedagū upalabbhati iti

original: “Ko panesa, mahārāja, vedagū nāmā”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ panesa mahā rāja vedagū nāma ati

original: “Yo, bhante, abbhantare jīvo cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, sotena saddaṁ suṇāti, ghānena
analyzed: yaḥ bhante abbhantare jīvaḥ cakkhunā rūpam passati sotena saddam suṇāti ghānena

original: gandhaṁ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṁ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusati, manasā dhammaṁ
analyzed: gandham ghāyati jivhāya rasam sāyati kāyena phoṭṭhabbam phusati manasā dhamma

original: vijānāti, yathā mayaṁ idha pāsāde nisinnā yena yena vātapānena iccheyyāma passituṁ,
analyzed: vijānāti yathā mayam pāsāde nisinnāḥ yena yena vāta pānena iccheyyāma passitu

original: tena tena vātapānena passeyyāma, puratthimenapi vātapānena passeyyāma, pacchimenapi
analyzed: tena tena vāta pānena passeyyāma puratthimena api vāta pānena passeyyāma pacchimena api

original: vātapānena passeyyāma, uttarenapi vātapānena passeyyāma, dakkhiṇenapi vātapānena passeyyāma.
analyzed: vāta pānena passeyyāma uttarena api vāta pānena passeyyāma dakkhiṇena api vāta pānena passeyyāma

original: Evameva kho, bhante, ayaṁ abbhantare jīvo yena yena dvārena icchati passituṁ, tena tena dvārena passatī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante ayam abbhantare jīvaḥ yena yena dvārena icchati passitu tena tena dvārena passati iti

original: Thero āha—
analyzed: theraḥ āha

original: “pañcadvāraṁ, mahārāja, bhaṇissāmi, taṁ suṇohi, sādhukaṁ manasikarohi, yadi abbhantare
analyzed: pañcadvāra mahā rāja bhaṇissāmi tam suṇohi sādhukam manasikarohi yadi abbhantare

original: jīvo cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, yathā mayaṁ idha pāsāde nisinnā yena yena vātapānena
analyzed: jīvaḥ cakkhunā rūpam passati yathā mayam idha pāsāde nisinnāḥ yena yena vāta pānena

original: iccheyyāma passituṁ, tena tena vātapānena rūpaṁyeva passeyyāma, puratthimenapi vātapānena
analyzed: iccheyyāma passitu tena tena vāta pānena rūpayā iva passeyyāma puratthimena api vāta pānena

original: rūpaṁyeva passeyyāma, pacchimenapi vātapānena rūpaṁyeva passeyyāma, uttarenapi vātapānena
analyzed: rūpayā iva passeyyāma pacchimena api vāta pānena rūpayā iva passeyyāma uttarena api vāta pānena

original: rūpaṁyeva passeyyāma, dakkhiṇenapi vātapānena rūpaṁyeva passeyyāma, evametena abbhantare
analyzed: rūpayā iva passeyyāma dakkhiṇena api vāta pānena rūpayā iva passeyyāma evam etena abbhantare

original: jīvena sotenapi rūpaṁyeva passitabbaṁ, ghānenapi rūpaṁyeva passitabbaṁ, jivhāyapi
analyzed: jīvena sotena api rūpayā iva passitabba ghānena api rūpayā iva passitabba jivhāya api

original: rūpaṁyeva passitabbaṁ, kāyenapi rūpaṁyeva passitabbaṁ, manasāpi rūpaṁyeva passitabbaṁ;
analyzed: rūpayā iva passitabba kāyena api rūpayā iva passitabba manasā api rūpayā iva passitabba

original: cakkhunāpi saddoyeva sotabbo, ghānenapi saddoyeva sotabbo, jivhāyapi saddoyeva sotabbo, kāyenapi saddoyeva sotabbo, manasāpi saddoyeva sotabbo;
analyzed: cakkhunā api saddaḥ yā iva sotabbaḥ ghānena api saddaḥ yā iva sotabbaḥ jivhāya api saddaḥ yā iva sotabbaḥ kāyena api saddaḥ yā iva sotabbaḥ manasā api saddaḥ yā iva sotabbaḥ

original: cakkhunāpi gandhoyeva ghāyitabbo, sotenapi gandhoyeva ghāyitabbo, jivhāyapi gandhoyeva ghāyitabbo, kāyenapi gandhoyeva ghāyitabbo, manasāpi gandhoyeva ghāyitabbo;
analyzed: cakkhunā api gandho yeva ghāyitabbo sotena api gandho yeva ghāyitabbo jivhāya api gandho yeva ghāyitabbo kāyena api gandhaḥ yeva ghāyitabbo manasā api gandhaḥ yeva ghāyitabbo

original: cakkhunāpi rasoyeva sāyitabbo, sotenapi rasoyeva sāyitabbo, ghānenapi rasoyeva sāyitabbo, kāyenapi rasoyeva sāyitabbo, manasāpi rasoyeva sāyitabbo;
analyzed: cakkhunā api rasaḥ yā iva sāyitabbo sotena api rasaḥ yā iva sāyitabbaḥ ghānena api rasaḥ yā iva sāyitabbaḥ kāyena api rasaḥ yā iva sāyitabbaḥ manasā api rasaḥ yā iva sāyitabbaḥ

original: cakkhunāpi phoṭṭhabbaṁyeva phusitabbaṁ, sotenapi phoṭṭhabbaṁ yeva phusitabbaṁ, ghānenapi
analyzed: cakkhunā api sotena api phoṭṭhabbam yeva phusitabba ghānena api

original: phoṭṭhabbaṁyeva phusitabbaṁ, jivhāyapi phoṭṭhabbaṁ yeva phusitabbaṁ, manasāpi phoṭṭhabbaṁyeva phusitabbaṁ;
analyzed: phoṭṭhabbayā iva phusitabba jivhāya api phoṭṭhabbam yā iva phusitabba manasā api phoṭṭhabbayā iva phusitabba

original: cakkhunāpi dhammaṁ yeva vijānitabbaṁ, sotenapi dhammaṁyeva vijānitabbaṁ, ghānenapi
analyzed: cakkhunā api sotena api dhammayā iva vijānitabba ghānena api

original: dhammaṁ yeva vijānitabbaṁ, jivhāyapi dhammaṁyeva vijānitabbaṁ, kāyenapi dhammaṁyeva vijānitabban”ti?
analyzed: dhammam yā iva vijānitabba jivhāya api dhammayā iva vijānitabba kāyena api dhammayā iva vijānitabbanti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Na kho te, mahārāja, yujjati purimena vā pacchimaṁ, pacchimena vā purimaṁ, yathā
analyzed: na kho te mahā rāja yujjati purimena vā pacchima pacchimena vā purima yathā

original: vā pana, mahārāja, mayaṁ idha pāsāde nisinnā imesu jālavātapānesu ugghāṭitesu mahantena
analyzed: vā pana mahā rāja mayam pāsāde nisinnā imesu jālavāta pānesu ugghāṭitesu mahantena

original: ākāsena bahimukhā suṭṭhutaraṁ rūpaṁ passāma, evametena abbhantare jīvenāpi cakkhudvāresu
analyzed: ākāsena bahimukhā suṭṭhutaram rūpam passāma evam etena abbhantare jīvena api cakkhu dvāresu

original: ugghāṭitesu mahantena ākāsena suṭṭhutaraṁ rūpaṁ passitabbaṁ, sotesu ugghāṭitesu …
analyzed: ugghāṭitesu mahantena ākāsena suṭṭhutaram rūpam sotesu ugghāṭitesu

original: ghāne ugghāṭite … jivhāya ugghāṭitāya … kāye ugghāṭite mahantena ākāsena suṭṭhutaraṁ
analyzed: ghāne ugghāṭite jivhāya ugghāṭitāya kāye ugghāṭite mahantena ākāsena suṭṭhutara

original: saddo sotabbo, gandho ghāyitabbo, raso sāyitabbo, phoṭṭhabbo phusitabbo”ti?
analyzed: saddaḥ sotabbaḥ gandhaḥ ghāyitabbaḥ rasaḥ sāyitabbaḥ phoṭṭhabbaḥ phusitabbaḥ iti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Na kho te, mahārāja, yujjati purimena vā pacchimaṁ, pacchimena vā purimaṁ, yathā
analyzed: na kho te mahā rāja yujjati purimena vā pacchima pacchimena vā purima yathā

original: vā pana, mahārāja, ayaṁ dinno nikkhamitvā bahidvārakoṭṭhake tiṭṭheyya, jānāsi tvaṁ,
analyzed: vā pana mahā rāja ayam dinnaḥ nikkhamitvā bahidvāra koṭṭhake tiṭṭheyya jānāsi tva

original: mahārāja, ‘ayaṁ dinno nikkhamitvā bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhito’”ti?
analyzed: mahā rāja ayam dinnaḥ nikkhamitvā bahidvāra koṭṭhake ṭhitaḥ ti

original: “Āma, bhante, jānāmī”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante jānāmi iti

original: “Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, ayaṁ dinno anto pavisitvā tava purato tiṭṭheyya, jānāsi tvaṁ, mahārāja, ‘ayaṁ dinno anto pavisitvā mama purato ṭhito’”ti?
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja ayam dinnaḥ antaḥ pavisitvā tava puratas tiṭṭheyya jānāsi tva mahā rāja ayam dinnaḥ antaḥ pavisitvā mama puratas ṭhitaḥ iti

original: “Āma, bhante, jānāmī”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante jānāmi iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, abbhantare so jīvo jivhāya rase nikkhitte jāneyya ambilattaṁ vā lavaṇattaṁ vā tittakattaṁ vā kaṭukattaṁ vā kasāyattaṁ vā madhurattaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja abbhantare saḥ jīvaḥ jivhāya rase nikkhitte jāneyya ambilattam vā lavaṇattam vā tittakattam vā kaṭukattam vā kasāyattam vā madhurattam vā ati

original: “Āma, bhante, jāneyyā”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante jāneyya ati

original: “Te rase anto paviṭṭhe jāneyya ambilattaṁ vā lavaṇattaṁ vā tittakattaṁ vā kaṭukattaṁ vā kasāyattaṁ vā madhurattaṁ vā”ti.
analyzed: te rase antar paviṭṭhe jāneyya ambilattam vā lavaṇattam vā tittakattam vā kaṭukattam vā kasāyattam vā madhurattam vā ati

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Na kho te, mahārāja, yujjati purimena vā pacchimaṁ, pacchimena vā purimaṁ, yathā,
analyzed: na kho te mahā rāja yujjati purimena vā pacchima pacchimena vā purima yathā

original: mahārāja, kocideva puriso madhughaṭasataṁ āharāpetvā madhudoṇiṁ pūrāpetvā purisassa
analyzed: mahā rāja kocid eva purisaḥ madhu ghaṭa satam āharāpetvā madhu doṇim pūrāpetvā purisassa

original: mukhaṁ pidahitvā madhudoṇiyā pakkhipeyya, jāneyya, mahārāja, so puriso madhuṁ sampannaṁ
analyzed: mukham pidahitvā madhu doṇiyā pakkhipeyya jāneyya mahā rāja saḥ purisaḥ madhum sampanna

original: vā na sampannaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: vā na sampannam vāti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kena kāraṇenā”ti?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena ati

original: “Na hi tassa, bhante, mukhe madhu paviṭṭhan”ti.
analyzed: na hi tassa bhante mukhe madhu paviṭṭhanti

original: “Na kho te, mahārāja, yujjati purimena vā pacchimaṁ, pacchimena vā puriman”ti.
analyzed: na kho te mahā rāja yujjati purimena vā pacchima pacchimena vā purimanti

original: “Nāhaṁ paṭibalo tayā vādinā saddhiṁ sallapituṁ;
analyzed: na aham paṭibalaḥ tayā vādinā saddhim sat lapitu

original: sādhu, bhante, atthaṁ jappehī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante attham jappehi iti

original: Thero abhidhammasaṁyuttāya kathāya rājānaṁ milindaṁ saññāpesi—
analyzed: theraḥ abhidhamma sayuttāya kathāya rājānam milindam saññāpesi

original: “idha, mahārāja, cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, taṁsahajātā
analyzed: idha mahārāja cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati

original: phasso vedanā saññā cetanā ekaggatā jīvitindriyaṁ manasikāroti evamete dhammā paccayato
analyzed: phassaḥ vedanā saññā cetanā ekagga tā jīvitindriyam manasikāraḥ ti evam ete dhammā paccayato

original: jāyanti, na hettha vedagū upalabbhati, sotañca paṭicca sadde ca …pe…
analyzed: jāyanti na ha ittha vedagū upalabbhati sotañca paṭicca sadde ca pe

original: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ, taṁsahajātā phasso vedanā saññā
analyzed: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati phassaḥ vedanā saññā

original: cetanā ekaggatā jīvitindriyaṁ manasikāroti evamete dhammā paccayato jāyanti, na hettha
analyzed: cetanā ekagga tā jīvitindriyam manasikāraḥ ti evam ete dhammā paccayataḥ jāyanti na ha ittha

original: vedagū upalabbhatī”ti.
analyzed: vedagūḥ upalabbhati iti

original: “Kallosi, bhante nāgasenā”ti.
analyzed: kallosi bhante nāgasena ati

original: Vedagūpañho chaṭṭho.
analyzed: vedagū pañhaḥ chaṭṭho
